howhow.item.fire_gemstone.name: Gem of Flame
howhow.item.ice_gemstone.name: Gem of Frost
howhow.item.lightning_gemstone.name: Gem of Thunder
howhow.item.fire_gemstone.lore_1: A gem infused with fire magic
howhow.item.ice_gemstone.lore_1: A gem infused with ice magic
howhow.item.lightning_gemstone.lore_1: A gem infused with thunder magic
howhow.item.gemstone.lore_2: Its power is somewhat unstable and
howhow.item.gemstone.lore_3: may be damaged by excessive use.
howhow.item.gemstone.lore_4: Try to use the crafter at the center
howhow.item.gemstone.lore_5: to craft undamaged gem with an Empty Staff.
howhow.item.fire_wand.name: Inferno Staff
howhow.item.ice_wand.name: Frostbite Staff
howhow.item.lightning_wand.name: Thunderstorm Staff
howhow.item.fire_wand.lore_1: After crafted with Gem of Flame,
howhow.item.wand.lore_2: it is no longer a useless stick.
howhow.item.ice_wand.lore_1: After crafted with Gem of Frost,
howhow.item.lightning_wand.lore_1: After crafted with Gem of Thunder,
howhow.item.40m_sword.name: 40-Meter Longsword
howhow.item.40m_sword.lore_2: 40 meters in theory, 38 meters in reality.
howhow.item.hammer.name: Red Hammer (Fake)
howhow.item.hammer.lore_1: A crudely painted hammer, with a
howhow.item.hammer.lore_3: Probably will break after few uses.
howhow.item.hammer.lore_4: Just use it to smash something.
howhow.item.clean_wand.name: Empty Staff
howhow.item.clean_wand.lore_2: Can be used to hit mobs like a stick.
howhow.item.clean_wand.lore_3: Try to use the crafter at the center
howhow.item.clean_wand.lore_4: to craft it with a Gem.
howhow.item.universe_cat.name: Universe Cat
howhow.item.universe_cat.lore_1: It was in the unstable superposition
howhow.item.universe_cat.lore_3: It has now been saved by player.
howhow.item.mg_head.name: Faith in M
howhow.item.mg_head.lore_1: People made it to pray for the return of M
howhow.item.mg_head.lore_2: There is an unknown power in it
howhow.item.mg_head.effect: (When equipped, nearby mobs have a chance to kneel down)
howhow.item.craft_barrier.put_wand: Empty Staff in the left slot
howhow.story.water_1: Aqua murmurat per undas fluidas, tenebras levans.
howhow.story.water_4: Stillæ lucent in aura caerulea nocte super alta.
howhow.story.fire_1: Ignis fremit in vortex rubedo ferox.
howhow.story.fire_4: Rogus resonat sub aura fervida igne ardenti semper vivus.
howhow.story.lightning_1: Fulgur stridet per nubes fractas argenteas.
howhow.story.lightning_4: Lux fulminis pandit vias occultas subito clamans visu acerbo.
howhow.item.memories.name: Memory Fragment
howhow.item.memories.lore_1: Collect 3 fragments to summon the boss
howhow.story.start_cat_task: Quest: bring 20 books to the cat
howhow.story.cat_1: 宇宙貓貓:喵喵喵，喵!!!(人類救救我啊!!!)
howhow.story.cat_2: 宇宙貓貓:喵喵，喵喵喵，喵!(我受了重傷，快變電子波散掉了!)
howhow.story.cat_3: 宇宙貓貓:喵喵喵 ，喵喵喵喵!!(幫我找一些知識讓我塌縮!!)
howhow.story.cat_4: 宇宙貓貓:喵喵!!!!!(拜託你了!!!!!)
howhow.story.cat_5: 宇宙貓貓:喵喵喵喵!(感謝你的救命之恩阿!)
